statements: SELECT * FROM Targets;
SELECT target_id, target_name, movement_history FROM Targets WHERE location='City A';
SELECT target_id, target_name FROM Targets ORDER BY target_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Targets WHERE target_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT target_id, target_name, movement_history FROM Targets WHERE location='City B' ORDER BY target_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT target_name, location FROM Targets WHERE target_id = 3;
SELECT target_id, movement_history FROM Targets WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM Targets WHERE target_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT target_id, location FROM Targets WHERE target_name = 'James' AND location <> 'HQ' ORDER BY target_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT target_id, target_name FROM targets ORDER BY target_name DESC;
SELECT target_name, location FROM targets WHERE target_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM manipulations WHERE manipulation_type = 'Infiltration';
SELECT target_name, manipulator_name, meeting_location FROM manipulations WHERE manipulation_type = 'Assassination' ORDER BY manipulator_name ASC;
SELECT target_name, location FROM targets WHERE target_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manipulations WHERE manipulation_type = 'Infiltration' ORDER BY manipulation_id DESC;
SELECT target_name, movement_history FROM targets WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY target_id ASC;
SELECT manipulator_name, meeting_location FROM manipulations WHERE target_id = 2 AND manipulation_type = 'Espionage';
SELECT target_name, location, movement_history FROM targets JOIN manipulations ON targets.target_id = manipulations.target_id WHERE manipulator_name = 'James Bond';
SELECT * FROM Targets;
SELECT target_name, date_obtained FROM Targets;
SELECT target_name, location_id FROM Targets ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM Locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT movement_id, target_id, location_id, method FROM Movements ORDER BY movement_date ASC;
SELECT target_name, location_id FROM Targets WHERE location_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY target_name DESC;
SELECT target_name, location_name, city, country FROM Targets JOIN Locations ON Targets.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT target_name, date_obtained FROM Targets WHERE date_obtained >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_obtained DESC;
SELECT movement_id, movement_date, method FROM Movements WHERE method = 'Infiltration' AND movement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT target_name, location_name, city, country FROM Targets JOIN Locations ON Targets.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT name, location FROM targets WHERE occupation='Spy';
SELECT target_id, name, location FROM targets ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM movements WHERE location='Safe House' ORDER BY time ASC;
SELECT tactic_id, name, description FROM tactics WHERE LENGTH(description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM targets ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, occupation FROM targets WHERE location='City A';
SELECT target_id, name, location FROM targets WHERE occupation='Hacker' AND location='City B';
SELECT tactics.name, manipulations.success FROM tactics INNER JOIN manipulations ON tactics.tactic_id = manipulations.tactic_id WHERE manipulations.success = true;

SELECT movements.location, tactics.name FROM movements INNER JOIN manipulations ON movements.movement_id = manipulations.movement_id INNER JOIN tactics ON manipulations.tactic_id = tactics.tactic_id ORDER BY movements.time DESC;
SELECT * FROM targets;
SELECT name, age FROM targets WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, location, age FROM targets WHERE location='Paris';
SELECT * FROM movements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT movement_type, COUNT(*) FROM movements GROUP BY movement_type;
SELECT * FROM targets WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, location FROM targets WHERE status='active';
SELECT movement_type, timestamp FROM movements ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT target_id, name, age FROM targets WHERE status='inactive' AND location='City Center';
SELECT interaction_id, target_id, location_id, tactic_id FROM interactions WHERE outcome='successful';
